snippet.title: Puyo Puyo Tetris 2 | A New Adventure Trailer
snippet.description:
Tetris Creator Alexey Pajitnov introduces an early look at the Adventure mode in Puyo Puyo Tetris 2! When the Dimensional Parasite puts their worlds in peril, it's up to Ringo, Tee, and friends to defeat it. Featuring a branching overworld, special missions, unlockable characters, bonus stages, and more! Available December 8.

puyo.sega.com/tetris2
